law.catch_line: Service for which no allowance shall be made.
law.text: No bonus shall be paid to any member of the Armed Forces of the United States who did only civilian work at civilian pay or who has received from another state a bonus similar to the bonus provided by KRS 40.410 to 40.560.
law.history: Amended 1991 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 2, effective March 1, 1991. -- Created 1988 (1st Extra Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 3.
